emails.subject: Important Account Update
emails.body: Dear customer, we have detected suspicious activity on your account. Please click the link below to verify your information.

emails.subject: Urgent Payment Request
emails.body: Hello, I hope this email finds you well. We urgently need you to make a payment. Please find the attached invoice for more details.

emails.subject: Security Alert: Unauthorized Access
emails.body: Dear user, we have detected unauthorized access to your account. Please reset your password immediately by clicking the link below.

emails.subject: Congratulations! You've Won a Prize
emails.body: Congratulations! You've been selected as the lucky winner of our prize. Please provide your personal information to claim your reward.

emails.subject: Important System Update
emails.body: Dear user, we are performing a system update. Please log in to your account and follow the instructions to complete the process.
